title: Welcome & get ready for the course
learning_objectives: Learners can access the Posit Cloud workspace for the course.

title: Welcome & get ready for the course
learning_objectives: Learners can use the Element chat to introduce themselves.

title: Welcome & get ready for the course
learning_objectives: Learners can open an issue on GitHub and tag the course instructor.

title: Welcome & get ready for the course
learning_objectives: Learners can clone a repository from GitHub and use the GitHub PAT to push a commit from their local repository to GitHub.

title: Welcome & get ready for the course
learning_objectives: Learners can identify four components of a Quarto file (YAML, code chunk, R code, markdown).

title: Data science lifecycle & Exploratory data analysis using visualization
learning_objectives: Learners can list the six elements of the data science lifecycle.

title: Data science lifecycle & Exploratory data analysis using visualization
learning_objectives: Learners can describe the four main aesthetic mappings that can be used to visualise data using the ggplot2 R Package.

title: Data science lifecycle & Exploratory data analysis using visualization
learning_objectives: Learners can control the colour scaling applied to a plot using colour as an aesthetic mapping.

title: Data science lifecycle & Exploratory data analysis using visualization
learning_objectives: Learners can compare three different geoms (bar/col, histogram, point) and their use case.

title: Data transformation with dplyr
learning_objectives: Learners can apply ten functions from the dplyr R Package to generate a subset of data for use in a table or plot.

title: Data import & Data organization in spreadsheets
learning_objectives: Learners can import data from files in CSV and XLSX format located in sub-directories of the root directory.

title: Data import & Data organization in spreadsheets
learning_objectives: Learners can explain the difference between the vector class character and the vector class factor.

title: Data import & Data organization in spreadsheets
learning_objectives: Learners can discuss the difference between unprocessed raw data, processed analysis-ready data, and data underlying a publication.

title: Data import & Data organization in spreadsheets
learning_objectives: Learners can apply 12 principles for data organisation in spreadsheets to the layout of a provided dataset.

title: Conditions & Dates & Tables
learning_objectives: Learners can apply functions from dplyr to change specific values of a variable in a dataframe.

title: Conditions & Dates & Tables
learning_objectives: Learners can apply functions from the lubridate package to convert dates not in ISO 8601 to the date class in R.

title: Conditions & Dates & Tables
learning_objectives: Learners can apply functions from knitr and gt package to display and cross-reference tables in HTML output reports.

title: Data types & Vectors & For Loops
learning_objectives: Learners can identify different ways of accessing a vector from a dataframe

title: Data types & Vectors & For Loops
learning_objectives: Learners can identify a for loop

title: Data types & Vectors & For Loops
learning_objectives: Learners can list the four main atomic vector types in R.

title: Pivoting & joining data
learning_objectives: Learners can apply functions from the tidyr R Package to transform their data from a wide to a long format and vice versa.

title: Pivoting & joining data
learning_objectives: Learners can apply functions from the dplyr R Package to join multiple data sets.

title: Pivoting & joining data
learning_objectives: Learners can understand the relevance a data dictionary to describe variable names in a data set.

title: Creating and publishing scholarly articles with Quarto and GitHub pages
learning_objectives: Learners can add literature references to Quarto files using the navigation menu of RStudio visual editor.

title: Creating and publishing scholarly articles with Quarto and GitHub pages
learning_objectives: Learners can cross-reference figures and tables within an Quarto file.

title: Creating and publishing scholarly articles with Quarto and GitHub pages
learning_objectives: Learners can use the GitHub pages service to publish a repository as a standalone website.

title: Bonus module: Use of AI for coding support
learning_objectives: Learners are aware of the responsibility for using AI and critically and evaluating all its output.

title: Bonus module: Use of AI for coding support
learning_objectives: Learners can explain the basics of AI and its potential for improving software development workflows.

title: Bonus module: Use of AI for coding support
learning_objectives: Implement strategies to write and debug code using AI-based tools

title: Work on Capstone project
learning_objectives: Learners can apply the skills obtained during the course to write a short data analysis project report.

title: Graduation of openwashdata academy
learning_objectives: Learners can find resources to continue their data science journey.

title: Graduation of openwashdata academy
learning_objectives: Learners can identify where and how to contact the openwashdata team for support with data sharing.

title: Graduation of openwashdata academy
learning_objectives: Learners can describe the skills and compentencies they have obtained in this course.
